message.content: This question requires knowledge about the basic principles of a flashlight and energy conversion. A flashlight converts the chemical energy stored in its batteries into light energy, which is called illumination. Option (A) is a play on words and not related to energy conversion. Option (B) is unrelated to flashlights and energy conversion. Option (C) is incorrect because flashlights do not convert chemical energy into food.
